column4: I am trying to upgrade from maverick to 11.04 but the upgrade-manager keeps saying "publishing notes have not been found" or a message of that fashion but in spanish.. Any tips?

Actually, it's better for /THIS TIME/ as there are quitea few people (If not, a whole lot) complaining about random things breaking after upgrading. TBH, you're better off staying on 11.04. Only clean install for bug fixes if you're qaiting for a bugfix.
Otherwise, experiment and have fun breaking things.
